title: Professional Development for Health Promotion Projects Based on Physical Literacy

context.prior_knowledge: Basic physical education knowledge and project-based learning experience
context.additional_context: Self-directed learning environment using digital devices, with continuous feedback through formative assessments

learning_goals: Explain and apply core concepts of physical literacy and health promotion principles
